name: The Eye Concentrate Cream
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is: A hydrating eye cream to reduce the look of dark circles, visibly diminish lines and wrinkles, and help prevent further damage...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dark circles..Formulation: Lightweight Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- Clarity Ferment (Sourced from Recovery Kelp): Restores brightness and reduces look of dark circles..- Lime Tea Concentrate: Contains antioxidants to protect skin from irritation due to environmental stressors..- Concentrated Miracle Broth™: Provides a soothing infusion of healing hydration to help support natural renewal for smoother-looking eyes...What Else You Need to Know: This fast-absorbing formula with triple the Concentrated Miracle Broth™, infuses skin with cell-renewing energy for smoother, brighter looking eyes. Sea-sourced ferments and antioxidants help diminish the look of dark circles, lines, and wrinkles, while protecting skin from environmental stressors. The cooling massage applicator also helps support microcirculation...Clinical Results: In a sensory test on 103 women ages 20–65 after using the Eye Concentrate for 4 weeks, twice per day:.- 95% of women said skin felt stronger and more stable..This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Twice daily, dab a small amount onto the cooling applicator and gently massage onto eye area for increased microcirculation..-Stow La Mer’s eye treatment applicators in the fridge for three to five minutes for a refreshing revamp of your go-to eye regimen..-La Mer’s iconic moisturizer (sold separately) matches perfectly with the targeted benefits of their Eye Concentrate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was using this for months with no issues, but no amazing results either. Recently I noticed a dry red rash with flaking skin under my eye that burns when I apply moisturizer to it. Come to find out it’s the same rash that others here are complaining about. I would avoid this to be safe.
Je n’ai jamais réagi aussi fortement à un produit. Ne vaut pas du tout le prix. J’ai eu mal pendant plus d’une semaine. N’achetez pas ce produit!!

reviews.review_text: My favorite of them all. Super lightweight and hydrating at the same time. She's expensive but she's worth it. Who cares spending money when it works.

Perfect for dry under eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very glamorous packaging, even a sample size comes in a thick silky pouch which I was shocked by. Very thick and you don't need much so seems like a product that would last a while. Feels fresh on my face and under eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream has that silky luxurious texture. It is very light and melts in the skin. There is not any fragrance to it. It keeps under eye area hydrated.  Very little comes long way. It has definitely brightened the under eye area .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye concentrate. It's so luxe. A little really goes a long and it feels amazing on my under eyes -- and really helps with my dark circles. This is a new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: obsessed w this eye cream it’s the silkiest and smoothest I’ve ever used. 100% will be repurchasing bc no other eye cream has sat this nicely under makeup and actually been as hydrating as this! I’m obsessed!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The La Mer eye concentrate is a wonderful eye cream. The texture is light and applied easily. It absorbed quickly leaving the under eye skin very comfortable. It helps with dark cycle if continues using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream helped reduce visible wrinkles around the eyes. The texture of the cream is very delicate and light. Absorbs perfectly and quickly without leaving any stickiness. moisturizes for a long time without irritating the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer is known as an exquisitely elegant and prestigious brand. In the past, the eye concentrate was a wonderful product that showed instant results in the puffiness of my eyes, the hydration of my under eye, and provided anti-aging benefits! The most recent version of this product is something that is completely out of the norm for La Mer! After just a few uses, my eyes became extremely swollen, my under eye became itchy and red, and my vision was effected substantially due to the swelling! I am now worried that quality control is not being used when it comes to beauty products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is so nice and luxurious. It’s so easy to apply and keeps my under eye hydrated. It absorbes quickly which is nice and goes well under my makeup. It has no scent which I feel is nice. My under eyes have started to look better since starting to use this. I would recommend.

reviews.review_title: Works great on crows feet & fine lines
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. I love the texture of La Mer The Eye Concentrate. It isn’t too thick, but not thin, so it absorbs quickly and nicely into the skin. It leaves my skin soft and my crows feet are less noticeable. I haven’t seen a vast improvement in under eye circles, but I love what it does for my fine lines and crows feet, so I would use the La Mer The Eye Concentrate for that reason alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm grateful to have been given the opportunity to try out a small sample of this La Mer The Eye Concentrate. Luckily, a little bit goes a long way, so it has given me multiple uses. I've only used it for a short while so far, so I haven't seen any drastic changes to my dark circles, but I think I see a bit of an improvement. I would like to try it longer and see how much it helps with my under eye area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product from La Mer. The formula is rich and creamy. The sample size is small but a little goes a long way! It's super moisturizing but I have not noticed much for my dark circles at the moment but will continue to use and see if there are more longer term effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is nice! After incorporating it to my routine, I see that I have less black circle under my eyes. The skin looks healthier and more hydrated. Love it so much! Highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, creamy and rich eye cream. It feels really luxurious and silky when applied. I noticed immediate hydration and plumping. Not sure I see long term results yet. It’s a big price tag but might be worth it for some

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using it for a few weeks, it definitely visibly has reduced the look of my dark circles. With continued use i am hoping to have them gone completely! Its worth the price tag in all honesty because a little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite eye creams to date despite it being very pricey. I have very dry skin, especially around my eyes, and this eye cream acts like a barrier that locks everything in. Great for both day time and night time use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a rich and smooth eye cream. It’s perfect for daily night time part of your final steps in skincare. I pair it with the La Mer cream and my skin is so smooth and wake up glowing. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best feeling eye cream I haven’t even tried. The formula is so rich and feels like silk when applying it to the under eyes. It absorbed into my skin beautifully and wore perfectly under my makeup products. This product took luxurious to a whole new level!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful cream, with a very pleasant texture. It's hard to say about any results or improvements yet, but what I can tell for sure is that it moisturizes the delicate under-eye area very well. So far, so good!

Love this eye cream! It feels so luxurious and leaves the under eye feeling smooth and moisturized, I would highly recommend! It’s great for everyday use and sits well under makeup as well. Love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product leaves my under eyes so HYDRATED! I love how easy it is to apply and that my skin absorbs it easily. I have sensitive skin and this eye cream does not bug me at all. Easy to use under concealer and makeup too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The amount I love this product is insane, it really does work. Wow my eye area looks so rested and like I sleep a full 8 hours every night. It’s also so smooth and my fine lines are hydrated and blurred away.

reviews.review_title: Nice product but who would pay this much?

reviews.review_text: As a sample,I love testing out this eye concentrate. It’s extremely hydrating, moisturizing and plumping. It really does make my under eye area feel taken care of and beyond moisturized. It’s not oily either, which is nice because those prone to oily eye areas won’t have any issues. I waited 30 seconds and it was absorbed. However, the price point of this is outrageous and I’m not sure something I would ever indulge in unless I was Taylor Swift.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the eye concentrate, it felt really hydrating under my eyes. I applied this under my eyes before applying my foundation and it helped fill in my under eyes and keep my concealer from drying out. I think the product is great just the price is so high!

reviews.review_title: Always come back to this one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t get enough of the eye concentrate! First, the texture is iconic-it’s the perfect consistency-its lightweight and hydrates, it brightens and helps w/anti aging, and it wears well with my concealer. I have hereditary dark circles and I always come back to this eye cream bc it works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used the eye concentrate and really love it. A little goes a long way and it's smooth and very hydrating. My dark circles are better after I use it and it just brighten my eyes.  I like that it doesn't smell and the consistency is not too thin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very luxurious eye cream. It works great with dehydrated and tired  under eye.  It has a creamy texture and moisturizing the skin very well. Expensive eye cream but a little goes a long way.  Great eye cream if you can afford it. Over, I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream feels luxurious. It isn’t thick and melts into the skin very nicely. Feels moisturizing and gives the impression of a high quality cream. I loved using it but I don’t think I can continuous afford to keep using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was finally able to try La Mer’s Eye Concentrate. A little goes a long way and it was very hydrating for me. I’ve been using it for a few days now and it helped tremendously after a long trip on a dehydrating airplane. I received the 5ml which is great for travel. Since you don’t need much of this product under your eyes, I can see why it’s worth the investment. I like the ingredients La Mer uses and the packaging is luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a luxurious eye cream! I love La Mer and this eye cream works wonders for tired or dry under eyes. It also just feels so nice and sinks in my skin so well. It layers beautifully under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been excited to try this La Mer eye creme concentrate for a while now and excited to finally get my hands on a travel version. This little guy is so good to add to your carry on especially for long travel days to perk up those darker circles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although the travel size is in an extremely small container I felt like I barely need any product to cover my under eyes. It seems like it will last forever. It doesn’t have a smell to it and comes in a super cute bag. Not sure what the benefits it’s suppose to give but my eyes are moisturized and seems like it is helping with bags under my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received The Eye Concentrate by La Mer. This has brightened and hydrated my under eyes immensely. This is easy to apply and a little does go a long way. I love how much my eyes pop now compared to just a week ago. The dark puffy circles under my eyes are gone and now I feel younger and so much prettier. Definitely recommend this for all ages.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used the LA Mer eye concentrate and overall, I thought it was a quality product. The product went on smoothly and didn't irritate my eyes at all. They felt really hydrated and it seemed to help my under eye circles quite a bit. I didn't notice too much help with fine lines but I was still pleased with the product. Also, a little product will cover both eyes so this should last a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye cream! It’s so hydrating and I love how well my makeup looks in my under eye now! Also I really like the consistency, it feels so fresh and I noticed a little bit of difference in my under eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eye cream! It really brightens my under-eye area and makes dark circles less noticeable. Plus, it protects my skin from city pollution with its antioxidants. The hydration it provides makes my skin smoother and reduces wrinkles. Overall, it exceeded my expectations and I'll keep using it daily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer never fails to deliver on luxurious quality, and their under eye cream is no exception. It has seamlessly become a staple in my daily skincare routine. The texture is incredibly smooth and soft, gliding effortlessly onto the delicate under eye area. Not to mention, the scent is divine, adding to the overall experience. With consistent use, I've noticed a visible reduction in wrinkles and dark circles, making it a must-have for anyone seeking effective anti-aging effects. La Mer continues to impress with its exceptional skincare offerings.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this concentrate! I have bad dark circles under my eyes and ever since I got this and started using it I feel like my circles aren’t so bad. I can still see them a little but I feel that if I keep using this they will disappear eventually. Very happy with this and I plan to keep using it from now on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super moisturizing and lasts for awhile. I put it under and around my eyes after I wash my face. It surprised me a couple times a little later in the night I’d touch that area and it was still really silky smooth. I didn’t notice any miracles from using it for over a week now. I just think it helps a lot with keeping my under eye skin moisturized. It has a really nice texture and no extreme smell. I have no negative effects to speak of. I don’t think it’s worth the steep price tag though — I will repost if I see extreme benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this super sparingly bc I don’t want to love it too much and be sad when it’s done and remember the price. That said, this REVIVES my under eye area so well. Hydrates and makes it look and feel super smooth. It’s just a nice product.. not much compliments other than the obvious hefty price tag. Even though I got a small little sample of this, it came on a really pretty and thick drawstring bag that I will definitely be using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is a spectacle of creation. I love it because it can make a difference in the reduction of my dark circles and they look clearer and more hydrated, the truth is that I am loving it, and every person who needs this wonder in their life should use it without fear, it is a product that has allowed me to see changes in a short time of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer Eye Concentrate is a luxurious and effective eye treatment. Its rich formula hydrates and smooths the delicate skin around the eyes, reducing the appearance of fine lines and puffiness. I have combination skin that tends to be dry and after using it consistently, I have noticed a significant improvement in the texture and brightness of my under-eye area. I highly recommend this product for anyone looking to improve the overall look and feel of their eye area.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is beautiful! The eye concentrate has a cream texture, it has a light, refreshing scent and a little goes a long way. I only need a small amount for each eye. I saw a noticeable improvement in the smoothness of my eye area after just one night of use! Over time, I believe it's also helping to reduce fine lines and dark circles. I'm impressed with this product - it's worth the price! The only thing is that I've experienced a slight sore sensation in my eyes in the morning.(I did lasik before, so it's more sensitive)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful texture! I love how this moisturizer adds so much of youth to my under eyes. It hydrates well and wears comfortably under makeup. Definitely my everyday essential and I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wonderful cream all around. The texture is silky smooth, gets absorbed quickly. It feels very lightweight, but it’s very moisturizing.  I saw a difference on my dark circles and puffiness since I started using it. It feels like it has a very subtle cooling perfect, which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The La Mer eye concentrate goes on smooth and makes the skin around my eyes feel softer and brighter. I struggle with dark under eyes so this is a great way I’ve been able to brighten it even a little!

reviews.review_title: Good but looking for specific needs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the La Mer Eye Concentrate Cream in exchange for my review and I’ve used this twice a day am & pm for a couple of weeks. I didn’t receive the cooling applicator with mine unfortunately so I’ve been applying gently with ring fingers - and a little goes a long way. So possibly would see different results with the applicator.   It has a lightweight consistency and is not greasy. I noticed a mild natural scent.  It absorbs nicely and I’ve noticed that my skin around the eyes is hydrated,  smooth and nourished. Which I loved and why giving the rating I did.  But I haven’t seen any improvement in my fine lines or puffiness (which I’m dying to find an answer too!). So I’ll keep looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the texture of this eye cream is so beautiful, even with my oily skin.  not at all heavy or greasy. although the price of this eye cream is incredibly high, a little bit of this goes very far and it can last you for a while. that being said, i'm not sure if i would purchase this myself with how pricey it is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im in love with this eye cream cool refreshing and helps with under eye smoothness and tightening would recommend to anybody no matter the age.   Once you've used La Mer, it's hard to go back and use another product. The results from La Mer beat out everything I have ever tried before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used the concentrate before and it honestly feels so nice on my eye. I have eye bags and dark circles from lack of sleep and this is truly a life saver. It’s very hydrating but doesn’t cause milia around the eye which tends to happen from time to time when an eye is way to thick on my eye.

Upon opening the jar, you're greeted with a rich, creamy texture that instantly feels indulgent. Despite its richness, the formula absorbs effortlessly into the skin, leaving no greasy residue behind. This is particularly important for an eye cream, as heavy formulations can often lead to milia or cause makeup to crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer's Eye Concentrate is my go-to remedy for tired eyes. Its velvety touch soothes and revitalizes, erasing fine lines and puffiness with ease. Enriched with their iconic Miracle Broth™, it's a comforting treat for my delicate eye area, leaving me refreshed and radiant. An essential indulgence in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La mer has always been a part of my high end skincare. I use it sparingly and a little goes a very long way. Very concentrated and spreads very easily. I love that it helps with my dark undereyes and makes my eyes look refreshed and plump.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love but a few drawbacks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I give this product 3 stars. The texture and consistency are perfect – creamy and light! It sinks into the skin beautifully, leaving a nice glow behind in it’s wake. The scent is extremely light, but still there and what I would describe as botanical. It doesn’t smell earthy, or mossy. It almost smells like foliage that has been rained on! It truly is a unique smell, and one that I found myself indulging in with every application. If you are okay with a light amount of fragrance you would like this one! It does contain fragrance as one of the ingredients though, so the scent is not natural to the actives. There are 2 things that I did NOT like about this product. The first is that after using for a few days, I started to notice milia in the area between my under eye and my nose, almost in the corner of my eye. It wasn’t awful, but it was certainly there. I felt as if this was clogging those pores a little bit, but they weren’t dark they were white which is what leads me to believe it was milia. After stopping use for a day, that went away. It was only on reapplication when it appeared again. The other negative for me personally is the CVS Receipt-length Ingredients list. This includes many ingredients that I don’t love, including Titanium Dioxide, Phenoxyethanol, multiple PEG/PPGs, Tetraacetylphytosphingosine (some forms of this are known to be hazardous to the eyes?!), Bht which has a moderate concern for causing cancer and a high concern for allergies & immunotoxicity, and Alumina which is supposed to be used a temporary relief of dry skin…not long term! After I went through the ingredient list, I actually downgraded by a star. At first I was going to give 4 stars, but this is a laundry list of ingredients and a lot of them most people would not be able to pronounce, and we certainly shouldn’t be regularly applying to our skin – especially an area as delicate as the eyes!

reviews.review_text: Whenever I don’t get enough sleep my dark circles are very noticeable and I have been using the La Mer eye cream and the bags are no longer there the next morning! It has also helped the wrinkles around my eyes over time. It is a pricier eye cream forsure but with good reason!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The La Mer Eye Concentrate is a hydrating eye cream to reduce the look of dark circles, visibly diminish lines and wrinkles, and help prevent further damage.  This fast-absorbing formula with triple the Concentrated Miracle Broth, infuses skin with cell-renewing energy for smoother, brighter looking eyes. Sea-sourced ferments and antioxidants help diminish the look of dark circles, lines, and wrinkles, while protecting skin from environmental stressors.  The ingredients in this concentrate cream are Clarity Ferment, sourced from Recovery Kelp, restores brightness and reduces look of dark circles, Lime Tea Concentrate, contains antioxidants to protect skin from irritation due to environmental stressors, and Concentrated Miracle Broth, which provides a soothing infusion of healing hydration to help support natural renewal for smoother-looking eyes.  I have already recommended the La Mer Eye Concentrate to many of my friends and family and several of them have already purchased and used this amazing Eye Concentrate as this fast-absorbing formula with triple the Concentrated Miracle Broth, infuses skin with cell-renewing energy for smoother, brighter looking eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible reaction!!! I’ve never had an allergy before, but this stuff burns. Fine when initially putting on, when I woke up my under eyes where swollen, red, cracked and so painful! I should have read the reviews…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer needs no introduction. The silky emulsion penetrates deeply, helping to brighten dark circles and thicken fragile skin with potent algae extracts. It is moisturizing yet very lightweight. My undereye fine lines seem to be less obvious the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have really hard wrinkles and I don’t have a reaction of allergy using this. Beware that you can’t apply anything else other than this eye cream. Last week  when I applied a serum and then with this it did have a reaction near my eye. Today I apply it on my dry skin and works perfectly. Was able to see less wrinkles

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is one of the best ones out there. It actually helps your eyes get rid of dark circles, wrinkles, and makes them look brighter. It also results in skin that looks naturally smooth and I love the texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer's The Eye Concentrate Cream is a luxurious solution for the delicate eye area. Its rich texture hydrates, reduces fine lines, puffiness, and dark circles, leaving the eyes refreshed and rejuvenated. While pricey, a little goes a long way, making it worth the investment for visible results. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I should have listened to the reviews… This gave me an immediate allergic reaction. My eye area got itchy and I broke out in bumps all around my eyes by almost immediately. It’s going to take a while to recover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this cream and within 30 minutes had the first reaction I’ve ever had from an eye cream. Upon noticing the swollen red patch emerging under my eye, I immediately cleansed the area with water. I then went online and saw so many more comments about reactions. Very disappointing. This product should be pulled.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my skin care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this eye cream for years and wouldn't use anything else! I know it's expensive but it does such an amazing job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of La Mer and I buy a jar of their crème de La Mer or the Soft cream about twice a year to treat myself. They frequently offer a 5ml of this beautiful eye cream with my purchase. That being said, if you tried the sample from the Sephora luxury set around January-April 2023 and got a reaction, it was a bad batch! I saw many comments and had to say something. This lightweight eye cream is not supposed to be watery, and shouldn’t cause irritation, swollen eyes, or allergies. It’s luxurious, has an amazing puffy texture, and leaves your skin around the eyes hydrated and bouncy. My sensitive skin loves it! For comparison, I added a picture of two sample sizes I took circa April 2023 - the watery one in the back is from the Sephora luxury set, and the one in the front is from the La Mer store. See for yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Although expensive, highly recommend! The applicator is super cooling and probably can be used with the cream to help with bloating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging and applicator look and feel super luxe. The cream applies well and my eye area feels very soft and hydrated after each use.   I don't think this is much better than other eye creams that I've tried. It was a nice treat, but entirely unnecessary when there are equal or even better products for a much more affordable price point.

reviews.review_title: Best Eye Cream on the Market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used a lot of eye creams. None of them have the results I've achieved with this. My dark circles are practically gone and my eye wrinkles directly under my eye are nearly gone as well. It's very hydrating and absorbs really well. The consistency is light and creamy and it doesn't have much of a scent. I bought it over a year ago and have been able to use it twice a day and I'm just now running out. If you want to try before you buy go to the La Mer counter at your local Neiman Marcus and they'll give you a sample for free. I've seen mixed reviews on this with people having bad reactions so I would definitely test it on your skin first. If it does work for your skin, commit and use the tiniest amount when you wake up and before you go to bed. Dab your finger once where you can still see your finger through it. Do not scoop. I promise a single dab is enough for both eyes because as creamy as it looks it spreads thin. This will continue to be a staple in my beauty routine.

reviews.review_title: Horrible reaction! Sensitive skin folks stay away!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this 0 stars if that was an option. I have quite sensitive skin, but have excellent results with other La Mer products, and have used some retinol products without issue. However, I had the worst reaction to this eye cream. My eyes became red, swollen, dry, painful and itchy for days, and had trouble seeing out of my left eye. I purchased this product at the La Mer counter at Square One in Mississauga, not at Sephora, and they did replace the bottle with another product free of charge. However, since I have sensitive skin and had such an intensely negative reaction to this product, I wanted to warn others with sensitive skin that they should pass on the eye concentrate, even if they love other La Mer products!

reviews.review_title: Miracle cream!!! Gets rid of dark circles!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for 7 years and I refuse to use any other eye cream. I started getting dark circles under my eyes in my mid-twenties, I tried under-eye filler thinking it would fill the hollowness that my eye troughs were creating. It did nothing and I actually hated the filler and couldn’t wait for it to dissolve. After having already gone through extreme and costly measures to rid my under eye darkness, I turned to the La Mer Eye Concentrate. After 2 weeks of consistently using it morning and night, I saw a dramatic improvement - see before/after photos. I’m approaching my mid-thirties now and my under eyes are so bright that I don’t even need to wear concealer. I’m so happy with this product and recommend it to all my friends. It is worth every penny since it actually breeds results. Most eye creams are just moisturizers packaged in small tubs with a price hike. This is the real deal. Just make sure you use it twice a day and continue to use it if you want to maintain results. I did venture out recently and tried their eye and expression cream - that works just as good but even better as it can be used on wrinkles all around the face and adds hydration on eyelids - it’s just more expensive. I may use that more when I’m in my forties. Idk what their miracle broth is made of, but it truly is a miracle. La Mer is the way to go for age-defying results.

the worst eye cream in my life. i never had any allergies before and thank god i only got the trial size from sephora favorites set, and didn’t splurge 400$ on it. it left my under eyes red and puffy really not worth the money!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my one and only. I've tried a lot of products and this one is just amazing. Don't mind the price tag when it works. Plus it last longer than expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this eye cream for lots of reasons but mainly for its non greasy formula and moisturizing.  Can’t say if it works to get rid of fine lines but it definitely hydrates and leaves my under eye area feeling moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worst product I’ve EVER spent my hard earned $$$ on! I’m STILL TRYING to make my eyes right with antibiotics and antihistamines… from what I have read this is a common problem and I’m actually furious! I’m going to write to everyone involved! entire

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for at least 15 years. I’m 55 and literally have NO wrinkles or fine lines around my eyes. Every time I try a different eye cream, I have fine lines within a week. I don’t know how or why it works, but I’ll never go without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is garbage. Do not waste your money! I used this product for a month and saw no beneficial difference. The skin around my eyes got very irritated… not sure if it was related. If you want a high end eye cream, try Dr. Barbara Sturm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's simply not worth the price. Lancome products have far better results. La Mer is a perceived superior product because of the outrageous price. If you have dry skin, expect this to dry you out even more and to do nothing for even the most shallow of very fine lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure if I got a bad batch since It was a 500 point reward but this is the worst eye cream I’ve ever used unfortunately! I’ve never had dry or irritated lids and I put this on and immediately it dried out my lids!

reviews.review_title: First allergic reaction of my life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using La Mer products for over a decade. One of my favourite products was The Eye Concentrate. Unfortunately, my latest experience with the eye concentrate (reformulated in 2020-21?) has left me with a very painful allergic reaction. I never had an allergic reaction to any skincare products before, so this was shocking and extremely disappointing to see that despite alarming reports and reviews for 2 years, La Mer still hasn’t acknowledged the issue.   Consistency is different, too: more watery and yellow. On La Mer website and elsewhere, I have read countless reviews similar to mine: women who used to love the eye concentrate, but upon trying the reformulated cream, got severe contact dermatitis and irritation that had to be treated with steroids and antihistamines. My eyelids are still so swollen and itchy. I’m extremely disappointed that after so many comments (there was even a lawsuit!) La Mer is not listening to their customers.    Please seek more information before purchasing, do your research, and proceed with caution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this religiously every night for over a month now and have seen no changes in the appearance of my under eyes. It is moisturizing but for the price, there are better alternatives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If there is any brand to get me to use an eye creme, it’s La Mer! I am just starting to notice dark circles and fine lines around my eyes. I loved using this to help bring life back into that area. It Also gave enough slip so I could lightly gua sha with it. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had used this product for years with no issues and only positive experience. I recently purchased and noticed the texture was different. DO NOT BUY.  It gave me chemical burns on my eye lids unlike any makeup ever before

reviews.review_title: Not great for me, but my mom loved it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how creamy this product was and how a little goes a long way! My favorite part is the little applicator it comes with. The cream helps reduce dark circles which is great! Although not a major concern of mine my mom saw an improved difference and really liked it! I will be gifting her a full size one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is amazing. I’ve used it for at least a week straight at night, and I’m obsessed. Talk about immense hydration, I wake up in the morning with my under eyes looking brand new. The skin is supple and plump. Best I’ve tried so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this eye cream. I totally can see a significant improvement under my eyes. My dark circles and puffiness is definitely reduced. The cream is not oily but yet hydrates pretty evenly the area. I have not feel any irritation whatsoever. I did not recieved the little spoon but other than that I used my finger.

I’ve been using the La Mer eye cream for a few weeks now and I’m starting to notice a difference. My under eyes look noticeably brighter and my wrinkles and dark lines have reduced as well. A little bit of this cream goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Can’t wait to splurge on a full size! The trial size went too fast!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been loving this eye cream! A little bit goes a longgg way. So this small jar is going to last me forever it feels like. It absorbs easily and feels light on the skin. Which I love because I’m prone to milia. I feel like it gives an instant radiance to the under eye and helps the appearance of my dark circles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes for this eye cream, but I didn't feel like it made a huge difference or was very moisturizing. It is very pricey and I don't think I would purchase this product unless I see better results over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I'm using La Mer product and i really liked it. For an eye cream it was very rich and moisturizing and feels like silk on eye area. However it contains fragrances, the thing I really look up from skincare products is unscented. It was very nice experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the hydration on this product for my under eyes specially because my make up went on so smooth and my concealer did not look cakey.  It absorbs really nicely into the skin it depuffed my eyes in the morning overall I really liked this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an eye cream I’ve always wanted to use. It is definitely very rich and moisturizing. It feels very luxurious and definitely gives a very hydrating feel to the eye area. Makes me feel more awake and bright!

reviews.review_title: Pricy but worth it if you have the funds
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is obviously a luxury product so the price tag is fairly steep. However with that being said, if you have the cash to spare I do think this is a beautiful eye cream to invest in. The consistency is thin so you can really stretch the product. A little goes a long way and it is extremely hydrating so a jar should last you a good while. It does have a bit of a fragrance but doesn’t linger on the skin and absorbs nicely. It’s also suitable for day or nighttime wear, hydrating and brightening while you sleep but also wears nicely under makeup. I think it would be an ideal product for dry or mature skin types especially.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was so super cooling, soft and moisturizing for my under eyes. I see an immediate difference in reduced puffiness. I haven’t seen any long term affects yet, but I’m hopeful! It has a nice clean cucumber smell. Overall I’m happy, and eager to see what it does over time.

reviews.review_title: award winning product from LA MER !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly truly a quality product to keep in you beauty arsenal!  Since I began using it, my eye skin has improved dramatically in appearance-my dark circles have disappeared. Upon application , ( a little goes a long way) it Instantly hydrates to visibly firm skin, and diminishes fine lines and circles. My sensitive skin has reacted well to the ingredients , so you know you are obtaining quality ingredients. ALL IN ALL, ANOTHER AWARD WINNING PRODUCT FROM LA MER!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with dark circles and have tried so many products to deal with them. The eye concentrate has really helped lessen the appearance of dark circles and generally brighten my eye area. A little goes a long way so it does last. My eyes look brighter and more refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always skeptical about expensive products, especially eye creams. I didn't dislike this product but I definitely don't think it's worth the price. There are many cheaper alternatives that work just as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer has always held a place in my heart and brain as being the most aspirational of all the skincare lines. There’s a reason so many people swear by their products. Now, I’m one of them. This eye cream is amazing. So amazing. I’m loving how the skin around my eyes looks more even and thus younger. Dark circles are significantly decreased. And the texture is so smooth, it’s almost liquid. It goes on so well and it doesn’t run! I’m so obsessed. I’m so glad I have this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream has helped so much with my dark circles, and best of all, a little goes a long way, Don't hesitate to buy. You’ll love the results just like me.  It absorbs quickly, allowing for instant hydration and glow results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: To say I’m obsessed is an understatement!!! This eye concentrate is so good! It instantly plumps my under eye and fills in the fine lines. What I love most about it though is how it feels on my skin! It is so light and soaks right in- which is not normal with a heavy eye cream

reviews.review_title: Feels like putting pillows on your eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging alone on this is absolutely amazing! It was a luxurious package to open! I’ve been using the eye cream for a little over two weeks and it feels like little pillows every time I put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this eye cream for the past two weeks and have enjoyed using it. I found that a little bit goes a long way. The cream did help reduce some of the appearance of my dark circles. I really liked that it was very moisturizing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this product. I’ve been using it a couple of days and I love how hydrating this eye cream feels. I don’t have super big bags under my eyes, so I’m not sure how well it works in that aspect. But I do love how hydrating it is. I just wish it wasn’t so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In just a short amount of time, I have been SO impressed with this product! I’ve struggled with my dark circles for so long but have seen major improvements since I got this product. I only have to use a tiny amount every day to cover under my eyes. They have lightened up significantly and I am looking forward to seeing how much more they improve!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is amazing. I have been using this luxurious cream twice a day and I am super impressed. I had been wanting to try it for such a long time. It has made my eyes look so much smoother and brighter. It contains Sea-sourced ferments and antioxidants that help diminish the look of dark circles, lines, and wrinkles, while protecting skin from environmental stressors. I would highly recommend this gorgeous eye cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying something from La Mer. The brand is iconic and can be pricey. As I’m entering my late 30s eye care is an important step in my routine. This eye cream is hydrating and seems effective. However, I hate that it is fragranced. The under eye area is so sensitive and I prefer things to be unscented, especially here. So unfortunately, it is not for me. But I think if you are ok with fragrance and can afford this, it will work well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin especially my under my eyes area and it feels amazing on my skin  leaving my eyes hydrated and bright. I have been using it for 2 weeks and it has helped a little with my dark circles. It's a luxury eye cream. The only thing I didn't like very much personally was the smell. It smells like if the product was old or like expired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer The Eye Concentrate is pure magic !  The formula is lightweight enough to fully absorb into the skin 10 min before bedtime (even with two coats). It’s non sticky with little to no scent. It’s been 12 days since using this day and night (while working 5 days a week overnight for 11 hrs) and during Christmas my family couldn’t believe how awake I looked. So sad the price tag is super high but this works !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is so good! I've been using for about 8 or 9 nine days and at night and have already noticed a big difference. The main difference I've noticed is in my dark circles. Jt had already significantly brighten them and my skin feels so hydrated. It is pricey, but a little bit goes a long way so. I also love the texture and super light if any scent. Plus, it absorbs fast and isn't heavy or greasy. Hight recommend 👌

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is so lux. It feels amazing on the skin. Leaving my eyes very very hydrated and fresh. I noticed darkness and circles decreasing after use. I have dry skin and it helps my eyes stay hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far I have been enjoying this eye cream. I like to use it at night and store it in my skin care fridge for maximum de puffing. Only time will tell for full results but I have noticed it helps with hydrating my under eyes and dark circles fade quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really loving this cream! The texture in my under eye looks amazing and I’m very happy with it! The packaging is also amazing and the cream smells great and feels great. This is a great eye cream, a must try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve enjoyed using this eye concentrate. The cooling applicator is very nice and a little definitely goes a long way in leaving the under eye skin very hydrated. I’ve seen improvement in my dark circles and would recommend this if you have the budget!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay wow! This eye cream is like magic in a jar! I know that’s a lot to say about an eye cream but wow! I can’t believe the results I saw in my eyes! My eyes were so much more awake and brighter! I am so obsessed! If you want to splurge on an eye cream this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Eye Concentrate has a light consistency, not sticky, and a barely there fragrance. My under eye area felt hydrated. Also, a little goes a long way. You do not need to apply a lot. I do think that this product helped with my dark circles, but it was not an instant thing. I did use this product for 2 weeks before noticing a visible difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Who doesn't love La Mer?! I was super happy to have received this, because I've been dying to try it out! It's such a good eye cream! It's totally different from the thicker formulated eye creams that I'm used to, so I really enjoy that this isn't too thick, and it also isn't super thin. It's got a great feeling on the skin. My eyes felt so hydrated after using this product, especially after using it for a week! I feel like it's doing a difference for my eyes, and I'm happy about that! La Mer, I love you, and I can't wait to try your products again!  (Photos: pink shirt is the before, and the black shirt is the after.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream didn’t really do much for me. It did moisturize decently but I did not see any significant difference after using it. I don’t think I’d purchase this at all or use this again. Not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first the eye cream consistency threw me off since it was a bit more runny compare to other eye creams I’ve used. Even so, I love how it easily blends into my skin, how hydrating it is, and my skin looks so smooth. I like to use this both during the day before my makeup for a nice smooth surface and my nighttime routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lamer is one of those iconic beauty brands, so this product did not disappoint. A little goes a long way, but I would never be able to spend so much money on just one step of my routine. This really helped hydrate my under eye and seemed to brighten the appearance of my dark circles.

reviews.review_title: Expensive but a little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream was quite nice! A little goes a long way with this product since the consistency is pretty thin. It has a little bit of a fragrance, and is nice and hydrating. I noticed a little bit of brightening the next morning so I think in the long run it might help with under eye circles. Overall, I think it’s quite an expensive product for what it is, but if you have the cash to spare it’s a lovely product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this under eye concentrate for the past few days and I have noticed that it has toned down my undereye wrinkles for the most part along with my dark undereyes. It leaves my undereyes with this luminous glow. Also, very little goes a long way I say a pea size amount for both undereyes especially because it seems like a water based consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy cow, the hype is so worth it! This eye concentrate is magic!! A little goes a very long way with this one and the results were both instant and got better with continued use. My under eyes were smoother and brighter than ever before!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a huge Good Molecules stan for eye cream, but I though Le Mar, a product that is substantially more would be better. It was really similar though! For both a little went a long way, smoothed my undereye circles, and La Mer even smelled nicer. But for the price, cannot justify it. $6 vs way way more? Can’t do it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this eye cream, the texture is perfection, the scent is pretty neutral, and the result is amazing. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
